Text: misleading . this is only a director comment with different episodes . boring to death

@saint84
well... it does say "special" in the title so one might anticipate something like that... i think.

Just so everybody knows what this is -
Once Upon a Time: The Price of Magic is the mid-season special for ABC's Once Upon a Time. It premiered on April 14th, 2013, and is hosted by Edward Kitsis and Adam Horowitz, and narrated by Alan Dale.
